title: [1.8.1] – RedPower 2 Prerelease 2b红石电缆2抢先版2（增加稳定性、减少一些bug等）
author: huhu呼呼
txt_content:
本帖最后由 huhu呼呼 于 2011-10-17 07:37 编辑 

红石电缆2抢先版2（b）减少一些bug


老版：【1.7.3】http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=7938&highlight=%BA%EC%CA%AF

话说稳定性高了好多 并且修正了在内置上的显示问题
已知问题：无法与rp2pr1兼容（意味着无法从rp2pr1升级到rp2pr2）
[saddle]下载（需要Unofficial MinecraftForge 1.1.1，ModLoader1.8.1 ModLoaderMp+1.8.1）
Download RedPowerHere is the current release of RedPower 2.0 Prerelease 2b.Single Player/Client Files:[1.8.1] RedPower Core V2.0pr2b
[1.8.1] RedPower Logic V2.0pr2b (Requires Core)
[1.8.1] RedPower Wiring V2.0pr2b (Requires Core)
[1.8.1] RedPower Array V2.0pr2b (Requires Core, Wiring, Logic)
[1.8.1] RedPower Lighting V2.0pr2b (Requires Core)
[1.8.1] RedPower World V2.0pr2b (Requires Core)
[1.8.1] RedPower Machine V2.0pr2b (Requires Core, World)Server Files:[1.8.1] RedPower Core Server V2.0pr2b
[1.8.1] RedPower Logic Server V2.0pr2b (Requires Core)
[1.8.1] RedPower Wiring Server V2.0pr2b (Requires Core)
[1.8.1] RedPower Array Server V2.0pr2b (Requires Core, Wiring, Logic)
[1.8.1] RedPower Lighting Server V2.0pr2b (Requires Core)
[1.8.1] RedPower World Server V2.0pr2b (Requires Core)
[1.8.1] RedPower Machine Server V2.0pr2b (Requires Core, World)


快捷下载[diamond_hoe]
[red_wool]红石电缆pr2b.rar
（已含Unofficial MinecraftForge 1.1.1，ModLoader1.8.1 ModLoaderMp+1.8.1[1.8.1] RedPower Core V2.0pr2b[1.8.1] RedPower Logic V2.0pr2b (Requires Core)[1.8.1] RedPower Wiring V2.0pr2b (Requires Core)[1.8.1] RedPower Array V2.0pr2b (Requires Core, Wiring, Logic)[1.8.1] RedPower Lighting V2.0pr2b (Requires Core)[1.8.1] RedPower World V2.0pr2b (Requires Core)[1.8.1] RedPower Machine V2.0pr2b (Requires Core, World)）


相对于rp2pr2没有更新内容
